q.name: q
q.description: Filter the entities by the provided string.

orderBy.name: orderBy
orderBy.description: Sort the returned entities by the provided property.

orderAsc.name: orderAsc
orderAsc.description: Sort the returned entities in the provided direction.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Limits the returned entities to, at most, the provided amount.

offset.name: offset
offset.description: Starts the returned entities after skipping the provided amount.
